entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
